venue.address_1: One mile north of Hampton Beach
venue.name: North Beach

item.description:
Scenic ocean view ride along Route 1A. Leisurely pace, no hills. We'll take time in Portsmouth for lunch and to wander through some of the shops. 17 miles going, 14 miles returning. Helmets required. We'll meet at North Beach, one mile north of Hampton Beach.

Directions to North Beach are as follows:
- From the north and west, take Route 101 East to the Route 95 exit 2 interchange (do not go onto Route 95)
- From the south and northeast, take Rt 95 to exit 2 in NH (there is a toll)

*
- Proceed on Route 101 for about 4.4 miles until you come to the end (the beach will be in front of you).
- Turn left, then immediately turn left into the first parking lot on the left.

We should return to North Beach at about 4:30 pm. For those interested, we can have dinner at the beach after the ride. Call if you have any questions,

Bob Dyer
603 883-1394 home
603 320-3155 cell
item.how_to_find_us: "I'll be at the parking lot with a yellow road bike"
item.name: Hampton Beach to Portsmouth NH Bicycle Ride
